translation.en: (PEOPLE CHATTING)
(PEOPLE YELLING)
(PEOPLE YELLING)
Yo, Jimmy, man. Give me the status. Tell me we good.
translation.zh: 吉米 什么情况 是好消息吧

translation.en: JIMMY: You got it, man. Beautiful.
It's gonna be an all-timer tonight.
All right, all right, all right, fire them up!
We go live in five!
It's time for ignition and straight automobile pimping.
translation.zh: 该点燃发动机 飙飙速度了

translation.en: Girl! Sorry! My bad!
All right, ladies! We're good.
translation.zh: 好了姑娘们 都准备好了

translation.en: We're good.
That's it, babies.
Come on, Tej! Let's get this race going!
translation.zh: 快点吧 泰奇 飚起来

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, man. Wait a second, man.
You cats are first wave, man. Where's your fourth at?
translation.zh: 你们是第一波的 四号车呢 杰奎因他今晚墓地轮班

translation.en: It was Joaquin, man, but he had to work the graveyard shift.
translation.zh: 杰奎因他今晚墓地轮班

translation.en: TEJ: What? Graveyard shift, man.
Why don't you run with us, Tej?
translation.zh: 不如你和我们比 泰奇

translation.en: Hell, no, I'm not running with y'all, man.
translation.zh: 不 我才不和你们比

translation.en: And I tell you what, either you find a fourth or you don't race. How about that?
translation.zh: 告诉你 找不到第四辆车 就别玩了 怎么样

translation.en: We should find two, so we don't have to roll with skirt here.
translation.zh: 得再找两个 把这小妞赶走

translation.en: Whoa, wait a second, wait a second.
Why don't I just find y'all a fourth
and we settle this on the streets?
Bring him on. Anybody I want?
No matter who it is? Yeah.
BRIAN: Yeah.
Yeah, man. You want to race tonight?
translation.zh: 伙计 今晚要赛车吗

translation.en: Yeah, you know I could use the money.
translation.zh: 好啊 你知道我需要钱

translation.en: You got four minutes, man.
All right. I'll be there.
The race starts in four minutes.
All right, girls, let's do this.
translation.zh: 好了 姑娘们 开始喽

translation.en: You think you're gonna win, baby?
What do you think?
You better. We got rent to pay. I know this.
translation.zh: 你必须赢 咱们还得付房租呢 我知道

translation.en: I'll get you when you get a car worth racing.
translation.zh: 等你有辆我愿与之一战的车再说吧

translation.en: There's our fourth right there.
Shit. It's Brian.
What's up, Tej? What's happening, dude?
Thanks for the invite. No problem at all, man.
Just remember me when you wax, all right?
translation.zh: 给车打蜡的时候记得找我就是了

translation.en: They got deep pockets?
Real deep.
What's up, Suki? What's up, Bullitt?
What do you say we kick it a nickel?
Nobody said nothing about raising the stakes.
If that's the case, why don't you ask these nice people here
translation.zh: 那你不如请在场的各位行行好

translation.en: to back off the line so you can go home.
Either that or you can go home, bruh.
It's all there. TEJ: Better be.
Damn, Suki, when are you going to pop my clutch?
translation.zh: 苏姬 你什么时候给我加加油啊

translation.en: As soon as you get the right set of tools.
Yeah, all right. All right.
All right, back up, back up. Let's go, let's go.
translation.zh: 后退后退 开始了 开始了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Back y'all asses up!
Back up. Back up before you turn into barbecue around here.
translation.zh: 后退后退 不然等着被烤焦吧

translation.en: It's not a game. This is serious.
translation.zh: 这可不是游戏 很严肃的

translation.en: All right, back up, back up. Get off the street. Off the street. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 都退后 把路让出来 快点

translation.en: Back it up, back it up. Everybody keep your heads real, real clear, all right?
translation.zh: 后退后退 都站好了 明白了吗

translation.en: 'Cause I got a surprise for y'all this evening.
Go, Slap Jack! Go, baby!
translation.zh: 加油 闪电杰克 加油

translation.en: I got this. I got this.
translation.zh: 我能行的 我能行的

translation.en: Ready?
Go!
Oh, hell, no!
You ain't passing me, dawg, you ain't passing me. Come on.
translation.zh: 你超不过的 超不过的 来啊

translation.en: What you got, man?
translation.zh: 还有什么本事 伙计

translation.en: I told you, you weren't gonna pass me!
translation.zh: 都说了 你超不了我的车

translation.en: Move, bitch!
Not tonight, baby!
translation.zh: 今晚不行了 亲爱的

translation.en: Bend over, boy.
Damn, girl!
Last turn, last turn.
translation.zh: 最后一个转弯 最后一个

translation.en: Too wide.
Home stretch, baby.
Got to go, dawg!
Yes!
I can smell you!
Yo, Jimmy, hit it, baby. Hit it.
translation.zh: 吉米 动手了 动手了

translation.en: All right. Y'all see that?
I told y'all I had a surprise.
How you like that for a finale?
Bridge.
Shit!
Oh, hell, no!
Smack that ass!
Yes!
Tell me I saw that, man. Bullitt and Suki sprayed the bridge.
translation.zh: 我看得没错吧 小布和苏姬越过了桥

translation.en: I need to start making y'all pay to even see this shit.
translation.zh: 这么精彩的一幕 真该收你们钱

translation.en: I got over $10,000 for my man right here, all right?
translation.zh: 你的奖金超过了一万美金

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about, man. Play with it.
Smells good, don't it? Yeah, how about that, right there?
Right, right, right. Y'all see this?
translation.zh: 对了对了 看到了没

translation.en: Everybody take a real good look.
This is what you call mutual respect. All right, let's clear out.
translation.zh: 这才叫互相尊重 散开吧

translation.en: Anybody down for another race?
Shit.
Hey, make sure you bring that body by the garage later
so we can work on that front end of yours.
Watch out.
Maybe I will.
Where are you going?
It's time to get out of here. Why is that?
Nissan Skyline! Got him!
translation.zh: 日产尼桑 我跟上了

translation.en: Shit! Shit! Shit!
translation.zh: 该死 该死 该死

translation.en: Shit.
Damn!
Let me see your hands! Put them up!
OFFICER: Yeah, this is him. We got him.
So, how long you been in South Florida?
translation.zh: 你来南佛罗里达多久了

translation.en: A while. Before that?
We know you're Brian O'Conner, formerly of the LAPD.
translation.zh: 我们知道你叫布莱恩·奥康纳 前洛杉矶警局警察

translation.en: Man, you got the wrong guy. Really?
BILKINS: How you doing, O'Conner?
Let's take a walk.
MARKHAM: Carter Verone.
Born in Argentina, but he's lived most of his life in Miami.
translation.zh: 阿根廷出生 但大部分时间生活在迈阿密

translation.en: Now he owns the biggest import-export business in the state.
translation.zh: 现在是美国最大的毒品交易商

translation.en: You see, unfortunately, the cartels have been successful
translation.zh: 你看 现在贩毒集团 已经渗透到迈阿密了

translation.en: getting drugs into Miami.
But they've had a hard time getting the cash out.
translation.zh: 但他们很难把现钱弄出去

translation.en: We've been surveilling him for a year.
translation.zh: 我们已经监视他一年了

translation.en: But we've never been able to put him and the money together.
translation.zh: 始终无法把他和黑钱联系到一起

translation.en: We've swept his house, his warehouses... Nothing.
translation.zh: 我们搜过他的屋子 仓库 一无所获

translation.en: Customs here has done a great job of getting us this far.
translation.zh: 卧底能帮我们到这步已实属不易

translation.en: I'm just here to help get them over the top.
translation.zh: 我要帮他们一举解决此事

translation.en: I was able to get an agent in undercover,
working travel and logistics for him.
Recently Verone put her in charge of finding some new drivers.
translation.zh: 最近维隆让她负责找新司机

translation.en: Right, although we can't confirm her status right now.
translation.zh: 虽然我们现在也不能确保她的忠诚

translation.en: You think she's flipped? She's one of mine. She's all right.
translation.zh: 你觉得她被策反了 她是我的人 没问题的

translation.en: She's been in with Verone nearly a year. Even lives at the compound with him now.
translation.zh: 她在维隆身边快一年了 还和他同住

translation.en: Look, it was the FBI's idea to bring you in here. I'm against it.
translation.zh: 是联调局让你加入的 我本人并不赞同

translation.en: But we need some good drivers that can put this asshole and his money together.
translation.zh: 但我们需要好手 让我们把他和钱联系起来

translation.en: You're gonna roll with Agent Dunn here.
And if I don't?
Here's a list of the laws you broke in L.A.
translation.zh: 这是你在洛杉矶的案底

translation.en: Obstruction of justice, aiding and abetting. You know the rap sheet.
translation.zh: 妨碍司法 伙同作案 这些警局的案底

translation.en: We can make this all go away in the interest of justice
translation.zh: 如果你愿意加入这次正义的行动

translation.en: if you're willing to play ball.
translation.zh: 我们可以让这些都一笔勾销

translation.en: So what's the idea here? Dunn and I are supposed to be street racers?
translation.zh: 你们什么打算 唐和我化身马路赛车手吗

translation.en: That's right.
So, Dunn,
looks like we're going to be partners, bro.
translation.zh: 看来我们就是搭档了 兄弟

translation.en: Could you tell me, what would be a better motor
translation.zh: 你觉得我的尼桑用什么马达更好

translation.en: for my Skyline, a Gallo 12 or a Gallo 24?
Twenty four.
I didn't know pizza places made motors.
See, man, come on, I can't do this.
translation.zh: 看见没 伙计 我干不来

translation.en: I mean, seriously, if this is what you're gonna give me,
translation.zh: 说真的 如果就派我这么个货色

translation.en: I may as well take my chances in Chino.
translation.zh: 我还是去赤诺碰碰运气吧

translation.en: BILKINS: We'll get someone else.
BRIAN: No way, man.
The only way I'll do this is if I get to pick the driver.
translation.zh: 唯一的办法就是我来选人

translation.en: All right, O'Conner. Who you got in mind?
translation.zh: 好吧 奥康纳 想到谁了

translation.en: This dude I grew up with in Barstow.
translation.zh: 和我一起在巴斯托长大的兄弟

translation.en: Who's that?
Roman Pearce.
(CAR ENGINES ROARING)
translation.zh: （欢迎来到 巴斯托 汽车赛）

translation.en: That your boy in the Monte Carlo? BRIAN: Yeah, that's him.
translation.zh: 这就是你在蒙特卡洛的兄弟 对

translation.en: Yeah, he's got some skills.
And he's crazy as hell, I'm telling you.
In a good way, though. He's the man for the job.
translation.zh: 这是优点 这活适合他

translation.en: And he's got quite a record, including three years upstate.
translation.zh: 案底很厚啊 还在北面蹲过三年

translation.en: Says here, he's on house arrest now.
Can't go more than 100 yards from his home.
(ANNOUNCER CHEERING ON LOUDSPEAKER)
He always said he'd be famous.
BRIAN: Pearce!
Roman Pearce!
Yo, whatever happens next, just let it go.
translation.zh: 不论发生什么 不要管

translation.en: I ain't in it.
Rome!
Only my homeboys call me Rome,
pig.
I'm not a cop anymore, bro. Is that true?
Blondie here is not a cop anymore?
translation.zh: 小金毛已经不是警察了

translation.en: That's true. No badge.
BILKINS: Here we go.
You still fight like shit. You still fight like shit.
translation.zh: 你打架还是这么烂 还是这么烂

translation.en: You better chill.
What the hell are you doing here? BRIAN: I'm gonna choke you.
translation.zh: 你来干什么 我要杀了你

translation.en: I told you to stay away from me.
You should have told me. I did three years, Brian.
translation.zh: 你该告诉我的 我蹲了三年牢

translation.en: I told you it wasn't my fault.
translation.zh: 我说了 那不是我的错

translation.en: Why did you come here, O'Conner?
translation.zh: 你来干什么 奥康纳

translation.en: I got a deal for you.
When I needed your ass, you were nowhere to be found.
translation.zh: 我需要你时 你鬼影子都没有

translation.en: Now you're trying to hand out deals?
I need you to come to Miami and drive with me.
translation.zh: 我要你和我一起到迈阿密开车

translation.en: If you do, they'll take off that anklet and they'll clear your entire record.
translation.zh: 同意的话 他们会 解除你的监视器 清光你的档案

translation.en: I did three years in jail.
Three years in jail over you, Brian.
translation.zh: 为你做了三年牢 布莱恩

translation.en: I know you better than you think.
Maybe you don't.
Maybe you don't.
You guys finished?
This deal legit?
That's right. If you do this job for us.
translation.zh: 合法 如果这次你帮了我们

translation.en: I told you. Shut up, punk.
So you're gonna clean my record
and get this thing off my ankle.
That's right.
I thought you couldn't wander more than 100 yards from your home.
translation.zh: 你不是不能离家100码之外吗

translation.en: Why do you think I'm parked so close to the derby?
translation.zh: 不然我干嘛把车开这么近

translation.en: Man, quit playing like you're gonna pass this up.
You stupid...
Wait. Hold on.
Bro, what's going on?
I don't know if I should be trusting you, man.
translation.zh: 我不知道能否信任你 伙计

translation.en: Just think of it this way. It's an opportunity for a fresh start.
translation.zh: 这样想 这会让你重新开始

translation.en: Now, let's just go do this, all right?
translation.zh: 所以赶紧行动吧 好吗

translation.en: I wouldn't need a fresh start if it wasn't for you.
translation.zh: 如果不是因为你 我也不需要重新开始

translation.en: Man, you've been using that since the day you got busted.
translation.zh: 伙计 你被抓后就开始怨天尤人

translation.en: Now, let's just chill out and go do this.
translation.zh: 现在该放下从前 行动了

translation.en: I don't need to chill out.
Yes, you do.
And you need to stop blaming me for your every mistake.
translation.zh: 也别再总把你自己的每一个错误 怪到我头上来了

translation.en: And Roman Pearce needs to start taking responsibility for his own actions.
translation.zh: 现在开始罗曼·皮尔斯 该为自己的行为负责了

translation.en: You need to go to hell. And you need to go back to Barstow.
I'm not going back to Barstow.
Brian O'Conner, Roman Pearce, meet Monica Fuentes.
translation.zh: 布莱恩·奥康纳 罗曼·皮尔斯 这位是莫妮卡·富恩特斯

translation.en: Do they have background on Verone? They've been briefed.
Good. All right, here's the deal.
translation.zh: 很好 现在是这样的

translation.en: Verone's looking for drivers. I've arranged for both of you to join up.
translation.zh: 维隆现在在招司机 我给你俩安排的活儿

translation.en: I've also hired some thugs, you know, to make it legit.
translation.zh: 我还找了些混混 好让这一切说得过去

translation.en: When do we start? Right now.
What are we driving?
Don't even think about taking the convertible.
It might loosen your mousse.
That's cool. That's too much chrome for me anyways.
translation.zh: 没事 太高调我不喜欢

translation.en: Damn! Where do you all confiscate these rims from, man?
translation.zh: 该死 你们哪搞到的这么多好车

translation.en: Check in with us after you meet him.
You think you're gonna have any problems with these two knuckleheads?
translation.zh: 这两个愣头青 你能搞的定吗

translation.en: I can handle them.
If they give you any trouble at all, you let me know.
translation.zh: 如果他们找你麻烦 直接告诉我

translation.en: Thanks, Markham.
I ride with you, cowboy.
translation.zh: 我坐你的车 小牛仔

translation.en: Why she gotta ride with you?
You get the convertible. Let's go.
translation.zh: 你都有敞篷车了 走吧

translation.en: Turn right here.
So, you used to be a cop? Yeah.
How long you been under?
I lost track.
You all right?
You might want to keep your eyes on the road, playboy.
translation.zh: 好好看路吧 花花公子

translation.en: What, you think we're gonna crash?
I haven't decided yet.
What are you doing, Brian?
translation.zh: 你干什么呢 布莱恩

translation.en: He did the "stare and drive" on you, didn't he? He got that from me.
translation.zh: 他对你用了瞪眼开车那招吗 那是跟我学的

translation.en: MONICA: Once we get in here, you're on your own.
translation.zh: 一进场 你们就要靠你们自己了

translation.en: Look at that one.
Where'd you get them cars? At the bottom of a cereal box?
translation.zh: 你们哪来的车 纸盒子下捡的吗

translation.en: Real funny, Fonzie.
Ass.
Roberto, Enrique, I need pictures of the drivers,
translation.zh: 罗伯特 恩里克 这些人的照片要给我

translation.en: their license plates, their cars, and anything else you can find.
translation.zh: 还有车牌证 车 以及你们能找到的所有信息

translation.en: Let's go.
Keep your mouth shut and follow my lead, all right?
translation.zh: 别说话 听我的 懂了吗

translation.en: I got this. No, I'm serious now.
Handle your business. I'll handle mine.
translation.zh: 管好你自己就行 我能照顾自己

translation.en: Watch your hands, bruh.
ENRIQUE: Go in line.
Let's go.
Carter.
The drivers are here. Good.
Come on.
Stay.
What's going on here, bro? Tell me.
translation.zh: 什么情况 伙计 跟我说说 谢谢大家这么短时间赶过来

translation.en: Thank you for coming on such short notice.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家这么短时间赶过来

translation.en: My red Ferrari was confiscated yesterday
translation.zh: 我的法拉利昨天被缴了

translation.en: and it sits in an impound lot in Little Haiti.
translation.zh: 现在在小海地的一个拖吊场里

translation.en: It's about 20 miles from here.
The car isn't important. What is important
translation.zh: 车不重要 重要的是我放在手套箱里的包裹

translation.en: is the package I left in the glove box.
translation.zh: 重要的是我放在手套箱里的包裹

translation.en: The first team back here with the package
translation.zh: 第一个带回包裹的车队

translation.en: will have an opportunity to work for me.
What are you saying? We got to audition?
translation.zh: 你什么意思 这是面试吗

translation.en: Nobody's got a gun to your head.
That's it.
Driver's licenses. Pass them up.
Before Christmas, guys.
Let's go!
Come on, cuz!
All right, let's see what this thing can do.
Agent Markham. I've got them heading south on I-95.
translation.zh: 马卡姆探员 发现他们在I95路向南

translation.en: Yeah, I got it.
They're running. What a surprise.
translation.zh: 他们在飙车了 真是个惊喜啊

translation.en: Come on, stick with me, Rome. What you got?
translation.zh: 快 跟紧我 罗姆 怎么样

translation.en: Why must I chase the cat?
Smart-ass.
Oh, yeah, you think you're the bomb, Rome?
translation.zh: 你觉得自己很厉害吗 罗姆

translation.en: Let's see if you still got it, Brian.
translation.zh: 你是不是实力不减当年 布莱恩

translation.en: All right, Rome, I got something for your ass.
translation.zh: 好吧 罗姆 我让你见识见识

translation.en: Watch this, bro.
Shit.
Damn, Rome, how do you like them apples?
translation.zh: 去你的 罗姆 喜欢吗

translation.en: Show-off!
That's the Brian O'Conner school of driving right there, baby!
translation.zh: 布莱恩·奥康纳给你上课了

translation.en: Crazy-ass white boy!
Shit!
RASTA: Bumbaclot.
WOMAN: You better get yourself out of the street!
That's some bad shit, man.
translation.zh: 那些人不好惹 伙计

translation.en: What do we got?
That's good. Show me his partner.
translation.zh: 挺好的 他的搭档呢

translation.en: Cars, cars. Where are the cars?
translation.zh: 车 车 车在哪儿呢

translation.en: Stinking boats. Where are the cars?
Come on, I need the cars. Where are the cars at?
translation.zh: 快啊 我需要车 车在哪儿

translation.en: Look in the center. Look in the center. What?
Cha-ching!
Now put your blouse back on. Hater.
PEARCE: Shit!
Don't let him get away. Not a problem.
(POLICE SIREN WAILS) Sit on it, Fonzie!
What the hell?
Shit. Cops.
What the hell are they doing here?
BRIAN: Rome, no!
Time to go.
Son of a bitch!
MONICA: Juvy record for popping cars. Two years in J.D.
translation.zh: 少年时曾偷车 少管所待了两年

translation.en: Then another year for aiding and abetting an armed robbery.
translation.zh: 还有协同持枪作案一年

translation.en: He's clean. Dirty, but clean.
translation.zh: 他没问题 不干净 但没问题

translation.en: All right.
Hey, man. You got something to eat up in there?
translation.zh: 伙计 你这儿有东西吃吗

translation.en: We hungry.
Sit them by the pool.
Nice. Come on.
What are you checking her out for? I'm not checking her out.
Yes, you were. No, I wasn't.
I seen you checking her out, man.
Okay, I was. Now shut up.
translation.zh: 好吧 我看了 闭嘴吧

translation.en: You shut up. Don't tell me to shut up.
translation.zh: 你闭嘴 别让我闭嘴

translation.en: Both you girlies shut up. Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 都别唧唧歪歪 万万没有想到啊

translation.en: You sure are cozy in this big old mansion.
translation.zh: 住在他的大房子里没问题吗

translation.en: Sleeping with the enemy.
No, no, no, no. Sit down.
Nice Ferrari you got in the driveway.
translation.zh: 车道上的法拉利不错啊

translation.en: I'm glad you like it.
Darling, will you hold that?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 拿一下好吗

translation.en: We did all that for a damn cigar?
translation.zh: 费这么大劲就为了一根雪茄吗

obviously
your pockets ain't nervous. Hey, hey.

"And you, I'll take my cutter back."

the losers will hand over them keys.

translation.en: Five minutes of her time, and she can get anything she wants from him.

translation.en: I love your hair.
Watch.
I wonder where they're going? Sit down.
translation.zh: 真想知道他们会去哪儿 坐吧

translation.en: So you lit my man's car on fire. Is that right?
translation.zh: 你把我手下的车点着了 是吗

translation.en: Yeah.
I did.
You see, I got a problem with authority.
I have that same problem.
For me, it's cops in particular.
translation.zh: 对我来说 尤其是警察

translation.en: Let's take a walk. Come on.
We just got here. And now we're leaving.
Let's go.
Come on.
What's all that?
We're going to have a little fun.
MONICA: Thank you.
It'll be fun. Let's stay longer. Let's get out of here.
Hey, Carter.
Meet Detective Whitworth.
translation.zh: 大家认识一下惠特沃思警探

translation.en: One of Miami's finest.
Thank you, sweetheart.
You enjoying yourself, Detective?
Yeah, I was.
I mean, you know me.
Yeah.
You've been on my payroll a long time.
Verone, that ain't right. Shut up.
I've got one last job for you, Detective. You hear me?
translation.zh: 我还有最后一个任务给你 懂吗

translation.en: Look, we've been all through this. Yeah?
translation.zh: -我们已经谈过了 -是吗 而且我也说了 我干不了

translation.en: Yeah, and I said I can't do it.
translation.zh: 而且我也说了 我干不了

translation.en: That's the wrong answer. The table.
(WHITWORTH GROANS) I'm a detective, Verone!
You do anything to me, the whole force is gonna be on your ass in a minute.
translation.zh: 你要是敢碰我 警局就会全部出动来抓你

translation.en: Shut your mouth, you fat piece of shit.
Stop right now.
What the hell? What the hell is that?
Sit down.
You're going to regret this. Stop right now!
translation.zh: 你会后悔的 给我住手 温度达到后 警探

translation.en: Once the bucket gets hot enough, Detective,
the rat is gonna want out.
And the only direction it can go, is south.
translation.zh: 而它唯一的逃生方向只有南

translation.en: Hold that.
Get it off me!
Shut up.
Did you know that your average rat can chew through a steel drainpipe?
translation.zh: 知道吗 普通的老鼠也能咬破钢铁管道

translation.en: You see, you have nothing to worry about when he's screaming, Detective.
translation.zh: 它尖叫的时候 其实你不用担心 警探

translation.en: It's when he goes quiet that he goes to work.
translation.zh: 安静了才表示它准备真正发力了

translation.en: WHITWORTH: Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!
translation.zh: 住手 住手 住手

translation.en: You can't be this stupid! Stop it now!
translation.zh: 你不会这么蠢的 住手

translation.en: You're in charge of the units that are watching my properties.
translation.zh: 你负责监管我那块地方的分队 我只需要 只需要15分钟

translation.en: What I want is, I want a 15-minute window
translation.zh: 我只需要 只需要15分钟

translation.en: where everybody, and I mean everybody, disappears. You hear me?
translation.zh: 你撤出所有人 明白吗

translation.en: I can't do it! You can't?
WHITWORTH: Stop it.
Okay. Monica, come here.
translation.zh: 好吧 莫妮卡 过来

translation.en: WHITWORTH: Help! Help!
Shut him up. Shut him up.
translation.zh: 让他闭嘴 让他闭嘴

translation.en: Help!
It's biting me!
What?
Got something you want to say?
It bit me. Jesus.
WHITWORTH: I'll do it! Do what? Say it.
I'll do it. I'll give you your window.
translation.zh: 我干 我会给你时间

translation.en: WHITWORTH: Just get it off me.
Get it off!
You betray me,
and my rat here
is gonna visit your wife, Lynn,
translation.zh: 就会找上你的妻子 琳

translation.en: your son, Clay, and your daughter, Lexi.
translation.zh: 还有你的儿女克雷和蕾西

translation.en: Do you hear me? Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 听到了吗 明白了吗

translation.en: You hear me? Get it off.
I'll burn your fucking eyes out! I'll burn them out.
translation.zh: 我会挖出你的眼 烧成窟窿

translation.en: Now, you can go.
Get rid of him. Let's go. Get it off.
You boys enjoy the show?
Fifteen minutes, and then every cop in Florida's gonna be on you.
translation.zh: 15分钟 然后全佛州的警察都会盯上你们

translation.en: Be at Versailles Cafe at 6:00 a.m., day after tomorrow, ready to drive.
translation.zh: 后天早上六点 在凡尔赛咖啡馆见 准备好开车

translation.en: You understand? Yeah.
Don't play games with me
or you'll be next. All right?
translation.zh: 不然下一个就是你们 好吗

translation.en: Help yourself to a little champagne. Let's go.
translation.zh: 香槟自己倒 我们走

translation.en: That was a damn rat, man.
You ever touch another man again, and I'll kill you.
translation.zh: 要是再碰别的男人 我就杀了你

translation.en: You hear me?
Look at me. You hear me?
She was into it, man. What's that about?
translation.zh: 她是那边的人了 怎么办

translation.en: You seen the way she grabbed the dude's head.
translation.zh: 你看见她抓着那人头的样子了

translation.en: She had to, man. He was testing her.
translation.zh: 她也是不得已 他在试探她

translation.en: You got to remember, her ass is on the line, just like ours.
translation.zh: 你得知道 她和我们一样 也是命悬一线

translation.en: You're feeling this girl way too much.
She's like that crazy-ass trailer rat from back in the day, Tanya.
translation.zh: 她也疯得很 就和从前那个小妞塔尼亚一样

translation.en: Tanya? Man, you went out with her after I did.
translation.zh: 塔尼亚吗 我之后你不也和她约会过

translation.en: I mean, I couldn't let it go to waste.
JIMMY: I got you. I got you. I got you.
translation.zh: 我要赢了 我要赢了

translation.en: Is that right?
(RAPPING) We go race for cash, but when I step on the gas,
translation.zh: 赛车为了钱 一脚油门踩

translation.en: my nitrous go blast, leave your ass in the past.
translation.zh: 跑得突突突 把你甩老远

translation.en: Tej, you about to lose your garage.
translation.zh: 把你泰奇输得个屁滚尿流

translation.en: Whatever, man.
I'm a low-budget mechanic, but I overcharge.

translation.en: Pay me! Let's go, man.
Pay me my money. I told you, man.
translation.zh: 钱都给我 我早说了伙计

translation.en: I'm glad you're happy man. I'm so glad. This is my garage, boy.
translation.zh: 你玩得开心我也开心 但这是我的地盘

translation.en: Royal flush. Give me this, man.
You got to talk to him, talk to him.
Damn, you can't play and play it for long.
Put that money back on the table. You know it's mine next hand.
translation.zh: 把钱放回去 下一把肯定是我赢

translation.en: Jimmy, how are you gonna pay me back if you keep losing to Tej like that?
translation.zh: 吉米 你要是一直输下去 可怎么还我钱

translation.en: How you doing, bro? Real good.
I'm going to crash, Tej. I'll catch you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我去休息了 明天见

translation.en: What are you doing here?

translation.en: Brian, they're gonna kill you. I heard him telling Enrique and Roberto.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 他们会杀了你的 我听到他们跟罗伯特和恩里克说了

translation.en: Once you finish the run, they're putting a bullet in your head.
translation.zh: 一旦完成任务 他们就会杀了你

translation.en: You sure you heard him right?
I'm sure. I'm sure.
Verone's boys is outside...
I see what they're looking for. Your little girlfriend here.
translation.zh: 我知道他们在找什么了 你的小女友来了

translation.en: They don't know I'm here. I snuck out.
translation.zh: 他们不会知道我在这的 我偷溜出来的

translation.en: What the hell are they doing here then?
I don't know. Maybe they're guessing.

translation.en: Go stall them. Go stall them for, like, two minutes.
translation.zh: 拖住他们 拖两分钟

translation.en: Check her, homey. Check her.
translation.zh: 看着她 伙计 看着她

translation.en: Found what you're looking for?
Hey, buddy. Hi, guys. How you doing?
Y'all still mad about y'all car?

translation.en: Don't even trip, homey. Come on, man, can't you take a joke?

translation.en: All right, this isn't about being a good cop anymore or doing your job.

translation.en: They're gonna kill you. You guys gotta pull out.

translation.en: Verone pay y'all to keep a straight face like that?

translation.en: 'Cause if I was making money, shit, I'd get that mole removed off my damn nose.

translation.en: Okay? Yeah.
How much he pay y'all anyway?
Every time I see y'all, man, y'all got the silk shirts on,

translation.en: jewelry, you know, looking real Miami.

translation.en: I caught you walking up in the club,
you got the hamburger meat all hanging out.

translation.en: Don't make that run, Brian. Don't make that run.

translation.en: Be careful.
Where are you going? You stay right here with us, buddy.

translation.en: Don't even think about it.
Stay your ass off my homeboy's boat.
Put the gun down! Put the gun down now!
You first, asshole! You first!

translation.en: I'll shoot the shit out of him! Now, put the gun down!

translation.en: Put down the gun now!
Put down the gun!
Enough. Enough.
Shut up. Shut up.
It's over. Come on.
VERONE: It's over. Let's go.
It's our gun. Come on, let's go. Let's go.

translation.en: I'm glad to see you boys are getting along so well

translation.en: because tomorrow, Roberto and Enrique are gonna be riding along with you.

translation.en: Just so we don't have any problems.
I'll see you guys in a bit.
What the hell was she doing in there, man?
Where'd you go this morning?
I went to breakfast with some friends.

translation.en: With friends?
I do have friends, Carter.

translation.en: Okay.
I'll see you later.
Nice shirt, Bilkins.
It's my day off. Yeah.
Well, anyhow, this is the deal.
Last night, Verone threatened a cop into giving us a window.

translation.en: We're driving to an airstrip in the Keys, off Nallwood Avenue.

translation.en: Verone has a plane there and he's taking off for good.

translation.en: Wait a minute. How do you know this?

translation.en: Monica.
She's doing her job. She warned us.

translation.en: She warned you about what?
Verone plans to kill us after we give him the money.

translation.en: Driving into an ambush was never part of the deal. I'm calling this off.

translation.en: No one's calling this off unless I do.

translation.en: Look, this is real simple.
You make the run, you get Verone and his cash together,
translation.zh: 你们去开车 把维隆 和钱联系到一起 我们就行动

translation.en: so I can move in for the bust.
translation.zh: 和钱联系到一起 我们就行动

translation.en: You don't, I'll file enough charges on both of you to make you disappear.

translation.en: Take these.
translation.zh: 拿着 我们会给你们定位

translation.en: We're gonna have GPS on you the whole time so you don't get any cute ideas.

translation.en: And to make sure nothing happens to them, right?

translation.en: Yeah, right.
That guy's a dick, man.
Let me get this right.
If we don't do this, then we go to jail.

translation.en: But if we do it, then Verone's going to kill us.
translation.zh: 如果干 就会被维隆灭口

translation.en: It's a hell of a deal, huh? Yeah.
Maybe it is.
I know this guy's got an ass full of loot that he's ready to dump in our cars.
translation.zh: 但我知道这家伙 会在我们车上装上一整车的战利品

translation.en: And I can think of two reasons why Verone doesn't need that money anymore.

translation.en: Here we go.
You and me.
Just like the old days.
What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢 我觉得他们惹错了人

translation.en: I think they messed with the wrong two guys, that's what I think.
Yo, Tej, what's up, bro? TEJ: What up?
Hey, man, how quickly can you organize?
TEJ: Look, if y'all really want to carry out this plan,
translation.zh: 如果你们真想拿下这架飞机

translation.en: this is definitely the best place to do it. So what do y'all think, man?
translation.zh: 这里绝对是最好的地方了 你们觉得如何

translation.en: I think it's perfect. So, what do they store here?
translation.zh: 我觉得很棒 车怎么放

translation.en: Man, this thing is clean.
Distributor cap.
Jimmy, do we have any half-empty bottles of nitrous lying around?

translation.en: Sure, but I've already loaded you for spray.
translation.zh: 当然 我已经帮你们装上了

translation.en: No, I'm thinking we may need it for something else
translation.zh: 不 我还有别的用处

translation.en: 'cause our cars may get a little crowded, you know?
translation.zh: 到时候会有点挤 不是吗

translation.en: Man, when did you start eating so much?
translation.zh: 伙计 你什么时候吃这么多了

translation.en: I was in jail, bruh.
I know how shitty the grub is on the inside.
translation.zh: 我知道里面的饭菜有多难吃

translation.en: With the way things are shaping up out here right now,
it'll be a matter of time before I'm back in there, or dead.
translation.zh: 我不是二进宫 就是死翘翘

translation.en: So I'm trying to eat all I can while I can.
translation.zh: 所以能吃的时候赶紧吃

translation.en: Plus, the doctor tells me I got a high metabolism.
Man, you remember us growing up?
You know, playing football in the dirt?
You know, getting into trouble. All the stupid things we did?
translation.zh: 惹的那些麻烦 干的那些蠢事

translation.en: When you got busted, you know, whether I was a cop or not,
translation.zh: 你被抓时 无论我是不是警察

translation.en: you know, if there was anything I could have done,
translation.zh: 如果我能为你做点什么

translation.en: you know, I would have done it.
I just want you to know that.
Is that why you let that dude go in L.A.?
translation.zh: 所以你在洛杉矶把那个人放走了

translation.en: Yeah, I think that had a lot to do with it.
When I got busted
it wasn't your fault.
It was all on me, Mr. Roman Pearce.

translation.en: Wild and out. Crazy man.
translation.zh: 桀骜不驯 尽干疯事

translation.en: No one could tell me nothing.
Riding solo.
Yeah, well, not anymore.
Not anymore, bro.
I've got Verone's Navigator leaving the residence.

translation.en: Copy.
Sir, we've got Verone on the move to the airstrip.
translation.zh: 长官 维隆已经去往停机坪

translation.en: Good. Let's get a bird in the air. Tell him to keep his distance.
translation.zh: 很好 空中也派人手 注意保持距离

translation.en: AGENT 1: Ready to go. AGENT 2: Thanks.
You're all set. Thanks.
All set? Yeah. Let's do it.
Report.
WHITWORTH: What's going on out there?
Team One, checking in.
Team Two, checking in. Team Three, checking in.
AGENT 1: Team Four, all clear here, too.
AGENT 2: Team Five, checking in.
AGENT 5: Team Six, all clear.
PEARCE: Here we go. BRIAN: Yeah, so you know what to do.
BRIAN: Stay cool. Keep focused.
translation.zh: 保持冷静 集中注意

translation.en: Remember the airstrip's off Nallwood Avenue.
translation.zh: 记住耐尔伍德的停机坪

translation.en: It's the third exit after the bridge.
Got it.
So, what up, man, you ready for this?
translation.zh: 你怎么样 伙计 准备好了吗

translation.en: Come on, man. Guns, murderers, and crooked cops?
translation.zh: 说什么呢 枪 谋杀 叛变的条子

translation.en: I was made for this, bruh!
ROBERTO: Come on.
I got activity at Verone's trailer property.
Do not move an inch until I tell you to!
Load up.
All units,
move on the trailer property. Right now! Move!
translation.zh: 进入拖车区 快 行动

translation.en: Shit. Local P.D. is moving in on our guys.
translation.zh: 该死 当地的警局介入了

translation.en: Three bags in one car? Guess so.
The cops.
I'm not going back to jail.
Where are you going, man? Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 你干什么 快走 快走

translation.en: What is he doing?
Okay, now let's get the chopper over them. I want eyes right on top.
translation.zh: 让直升机跟上他们 我要从上面监视

translation.en: You got it.
Lima 2-5,
follow GPS.
Do you know what you're doing, man?
translation.zh: 你知道自己在干什么吗

translation.en: Stay with me, Rome. Stay with me. Come on, man.
translation.zh: 跟紧我 罗姆 跟紧我

translation.en: PILOT: I've got them heading south on I-95.
Bring in the aerial ESDs.
Oh, shit!
They're catching up, man! Shut up, man!
Nice driving, Rome, nice driving.
translation.zh: 开得好 罗姆 开得好

translation.en: I got you, Brian.
translation.zh: 我跟着你呢 布莱恩

translation.en: Check it out!
What was that?
Oh, shit!
Come on, man. Take the wheel. No, no, no, no. I can't drive.
Just hold the wheel! Put your hands on it. I can't drive!
translation.zh: 稳住方向盘 放上来 我不会开车

translation.en: Just hold it steady. Just like that.
What are you doing, man?
Yeah, man!
Hold.
Bilkins, the bird's in place.
We've got Verone's Navigator.
All right. Money's in transit. Sit tight.
translation.zh: 好 钱还在路上 稳住

translation.en: You're a good driver, man.
Thanks, bro.
We've got the area blocked ahead. They've got nowhere to go.
translation.zh: 我们已经封锁了下一个区 他们无路可去了

translation.en: What was that?
MALE PILOT: I've got a visual.
Video should be coming through.
I got it. Looks good.
Where are they going?
Shit.
All right, Miami's finest, let's see what you got.
translation.zh: 迈阿密最好的车手 让我看看你的能耐

translation.en: Come on. Stay with me, boys.
Hey, man, everyone's here. Time for the show.
translation.zh: 伙计人都到齐了 好戏开始了

translation.en: Let's give it to them.
All right, let the party begin. Let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 狂欢开始了 出发

translation.en: This is unit 25-99. We have the suspects surrounded.
Holy shit!
It's a scramble, baby! A big one!
translation.zh: 一团混乱啊 一团混乱

translation.en: Yeah! Let's do this!
Check this out.
We're not tracking them on video.
We must have lost them in the scramble.
translation.zh: 他们肯定在混乱中跑了

translation.en: Yo, let's break.
Yeah!
All right, we got them going west on Beach.
translation.zh: 好了 他们在海滩路向西行驶

translation.en: Roger that! I've got them!
Customs has a fix on two cars going west on Beach.
translation.zh: 海关部说这两部车在海滩路向西

translation.en: Roger. Follow those cars.
translation.zh: 明白 跟着这两辆车

translation.en: Roger that.
Shit.
They're cornered.
POLICEMAN: Keep your hands where I can see them!
Hands up!
translation.zh: 举起手 伙计们 我知道我的牌照过期了

translation.en: Whoa, fellas, fellas, I know my tags are out of date, but damn.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我知道我的牌照过期了

translation.en: What the hell?
Where are they?
How about them apples, man?
Yeah! That's some driving for your ass, baby!
translation.zh: 今天让你们见识什么是真正的驾驶

translation.en: Ain't that some driving for your ass?
Good job, man.
What are you talking about, man? Whatever, man.
You're supposed to be a stone-faced killer!

translation.en: You over there were grabbing your seat belt!
translation.zh: 结果只会死死地抓着安全带

translation.en: Hey, Tej, thanks a lot, bro. Man, you're clutch. I owe you one big time.
translation.zh: 泰奇 太感谢了 兄弟 够哥们 我欠你的

translation.en: Yeah, Brian, you really do owe me, man. You really do...

translation.en: Us.

translation.en: Enjoying the ride?

American muscle.

Brian?
Brian, man, what's the hold-up, bro?

translation.en: So, what are you saying? Like I said, there's a new plan.
Brian?
Brian? Hello, you there?
Damn!
Yo, what the hell is he doing?
The feds are in the wrong place.
Brian's woman is on her own with Verone.

translation.en: So...
So Brian's not coming!
It's all right, let him out. Get out.
Pop the trunk.
Hurry up.
Where's the rest of it?
The other car. Another car?
Where's the other car? On its way.
On the way? Yeah.
Here's your money.
So you know nothing about the agents that stormed my jet?

translation.en: The funny thing is, I only told one person about the airstrip.

Let's go. Get on the boat.
Hide the cars and get rid of him.

translation.en: Back in the car.
End of the road.
You know, I like you.
But I still got to kill you. It's my job.

translation.en: What's that?
PEARCE: It's Barstow, baby!

translation.en: It's about to get ugly!
Let's go. Let's go.
Come on.
You had me.
You slipped.
Eleven and a half months, and you slipped once.

translation.en: Put her downstairs.
See you in a second.
I thought you was dead, man.

translation.en: Yeah, me, too. Thanks for saving my ass, bro.

Car. Boat.
You're not gonna do what I think you're gonna do?
Yeah, I think so. You got my back, bro? Yeah.

translation.en: Show him some Dukes of Hazzard shit!

translation.en: We're gonna do this big! Hold on, Rome! Hold on!

translation.en: Brian, you're crazy, man!
What the hell are you doing?
I think I broke my arm, man.
Get the gun.
It's over, Carter.
You okay?
Yeah!
I'm great.
We got him, man.
We got him. Let's get out of here.

So, there were three bags total? The three from the boat?

translation.en: So we're good, right?
Our records are clean?
You held up your end.
Your records are clean.
So maybe there were six bags.
I guess we can call it even.
Agent Dunn? Sir.
We found some more evidence.
Come on, let's take it to the truck.
Don't drop the soap, big homey.
I hope you know that when he gets out, he's going to kill your ass.

translation.en: He ain't getting out.
I'll see you soon.
You think he's going to get out? He'll be out.
Not for real. You think he's getting out, dawg?

translation.en: We took care of your decoys. They're free and clear.

translation.en: There's a sedan out on the road for you.
Try to bring it back in one piece.
Thanks a lot, Bilkins. You're all right.

translation.en: Thanks. Thanks for looking out, man.
Do you trust me now?
You're all right.
Sorry.
Nice working with you, O'Conner.

translation.en: Same here.
I might have to stay here in Miami, and keep you out of trouble, bruh.

translation.en: You know what I'm talking about.
You're going to kick it in Miami, bro?
Oh, man, I love Miami. Miami is off the hook!

translation.en: Open a garage together.
A garage? How are we going to do that, bruh?
Pockets ain't empty, cuz.
And we ain't hungry no more either, right?
